ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 save DOUBLE your hard drive space, record long time. Adopt standard H.264 format,Adopt standard FAT32 file system, compatible with computers
Powerful Network Functions: Remote Surveillance, Remote Playback, Remote A Recording, Remote Control DVR ,IE Embedded
Support max 4 x SATA HDD,full mouse control,VGA output,dual stream, IE browser to remote view
Support mobile surveillance by phones with WinCE and 3G, and iphone,multi-level user management. Administrator can manage the operating rights of other users.
Support event log. Users can check the earlier working status of the DVR by this.
